apiDomain.title: Domain of the Prompt Security Protect API
apiDomain.description: Configures the domain of the Protect API by Prompt Security

apiKey.title: API key for the Prompt Security Protect API
apiKey.description: Configures the api key of the Protect API by Prompt Security

policyName.title: Policy name to use - Optional
policyName.description: Configures the policy name that should be used by Prompt Security

idp.title: SSO IDP - Optional
idp.description: Configures which identity provider to use for SSO

idpUrl.title: SSO IDP URL - Optional
idpUrl.description: The URL of the identity provider to use for SSO

idpClientId.title: SSO IDP Client ID - Optional
idpClientId.description: The client id for the identity provider to use for SSO

addCustomHttpHeader.title: Add Custom HTTP Header (true/false) - Optional
addCustomHttpHeader.description: Add a custom HTTP header to all requests (to detect incognito usage)

ideIntegationPortNumber.title: IDE integration port number - Optional
ideIntegationPortNumber.description: The port for detecting source code copied from the IDE and pasted into the browser

ideIntegationDontSendCode.title: IDE integration don't send code (true/false) - Optional
ideIntegationDontSendCode.description: Don't send source code copied from the IDE to Prompt Security's servers

userName.title: User Name - Optional
userName.description: The username of the end user (can be set via MDM)

machineName.title: Machine Name - Optional
machineName.description: The machine name of the end user (can be set via MDM)
